column1: Coloboma of the iris is a hole or defect of the iris of the eye.
Coloboma of the iris can look like a second pupil or a black notch at the edge of the pupil.
A small coloboma (especially if it is not attached to the pupil) may allow a second image to focus on the back of the eye.
Contact your health care provider if: - You notice that your child has what appears to be a hole in the iris or an unusual-shaped pupil.
